metadata.title: CVE-2018-11710 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
soundlib/pattern.h in libopenmpt before 0.3.9 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted AMS file because of an invalid write nearaddress 0 in an out-of-memory situation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11710` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenmpt0 - 0.3.9-1
openmpt123 - 0.3.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libopenmpt package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9-1').
